com.acmol.risk

Class RandomInitializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acmol.risk.RandomInitializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ArmyInitializer

    public class RandomInitializer
extends java.lang.Object
implements ArmyInitializer
    Class for allocating the army at the beginning of a game. The allocation is done randomly all in once by the server Please see the ArmyInitializer interface Please see the ManualInitializer class for the manual case
    Author:
    LASHERME Loic, FILAUDEAU Eloi, NANTIER Matthias, BOURSIER Louis

        public void initArmy(java.util.ArrayList<Continent> continents,

        Allocate the army for the initialization. The allocation is done randomly all in once by the server
